required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of pegInterferon Alfa-2a, Ribavirin, and Daclatasvir (BMS-790052) With or Without BMS-650032 for Participants in Some Hepatitis C Virus Trials
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label Re-Treatment Study With PegInterferon Alfa-2a, Ribavirin and BMS-790052 With or Without BMS-650032 for Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis C

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to provide anti-hepatitis C virus drugs to patients who received placebo + peginterferon alfa-2a + ribavirin in prior Bristol-Myers Squibb (BMS) studies and determine whether addition of these drugs results in higher cure rates in patients who previously failed therapy. Approximately 100 genotype 1b patients who received placebo in BMS study NCT01428063 (AI447-028) will receive active drugs in this study.

detailed_description.textblock:
- Intervention Model:
- Parallel: for all patients entering the trial
- Cross-over: for genotype 1b patients rolling over from NCT01428063 (AI447-028) who require rescue therapy after initial treatment in this study
- Peginterferon alfa-2a
- Ribavirin
- Daclatasvir
- Asunaprevir

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response at Week 12 (SVR12) for All Nonresponders With Genotype 1 Hepatitis C Virus (HCV)
primary_outcome.description: SVR12 defined as HCV RNA<limit of quantitation at follow-up Week 12. Nonresponder (NR)=prior NR to pegIFN-2a or ribavirin.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Other Than Genotype 1 With Sustained Virologic Response at Post Treatment Week 12 (SVR12)
secondary_outcome.description: SVR12 was defined as hepatitis C virus (HCV) RNA less than the lower limit of quantitation, target detected or target not detected at follow-up Week 12.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Rapid Virologic Response (RVR) at Post Treatment Week 4
secondary_outcome.description: RVR was defined as the percentage of participants with hepatitis C virus (HCV) RNA less than the lower limit of quantitation, target not detected at Week 4.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Extended Rapid Virologic Response (eRVR)
secondary_outcome.description: eRVR was defined as the percentage of participants with hepatitis C virus (HCV) RNA less than the lower limit of quantitation, target not detected at both weeks 4 and 12.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Complete Early Virologic Response (cEVR)
secondary_outcome.description: cEVR was defined as the percentage of participants with hepatitis C virus (HCV) RNA less than the lower limit of quantitation, target not detected at week 12.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With End of the Treatment Response (EOTR)
secondary_outcome.description: EOTR was defined as the percentage of participants with hepatitis C virus (HCV) RNA less than the lower limit of quantitation, target not detected at end of treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response at Post Treatment Week 24 (SVR24)
secondary_outcome.description: SVR24 was defined as the percentage of participants with hepatitis C virus (HCV) RNA less than the lower limit of quantitation, target detected or target not detected at follow-up week 24.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Serious Adverse Events (SAEs), Discontinuations Due to AEs, and Who Died During the Study
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For AEs: Day 1 until last visit. For SAEs: Day 1 until 30 days post discontinuation of dosing or participation
secondary_outcome.description: AE was defined as any new unfavorable symptom, sign, or disease or worsening of a preexisting condition that does not necessarily have a causal relationship with treatment. SAE was defined as a medical event that at any dose resulted in death, persistent or significant disability/incapacity, or drug dependency/abuse; was life-threatening, an important medical event, or a congenital anomaly/birth defect; or required or prolonged hospitalization.

arm_group.description: Patients received daclatasvir, 60-mg tablet, by mouth once daily + asunaprevir, 100-mg capsule or 200-mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα-2a, 180-μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + ribavirin, weight-based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks

Patients received daclatasvir, (two 30-mg tablets or one 60-mg tablet, by mouth once daily) + pegIFNα-2a, 180-μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + ribavirin, weight-based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks
Patients received daclatasvir, 60-mg tablet, by mouth once daily + asunaprevir, 100-mg capsule, by mouth twice daily for 24 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
- Prior participation in any BMS-790052, BMS-650032, or BMS-791325 trial and assigned to control arm (pegIFNα-2a/ribavirin + placebo) during the trial
- Hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotype 1, 2, 3, or 4 (mixed genotypes are not permitted)
- HCV RNA viral load detectable
Key Exclusion Criteria:
- Discontinuation from a prior BMS HCV clinical trial due to a pegIFNα-2a/ribavirin-related event
- Any anti-HCV therapy following initial treatment with BMS-650032, BMS-790052, or BMS-791325
- Positive for hepatitis B infection (hepatitis B surface antigen) or HIV-1 or HIV-2 antibody at screening
- Evidence of medical condition associated with chronic liver disease other than HCV infection
- Evidence of decompensated cirrhosis based on radiologic criteria or biopsy

facility.name: Scpmg/ Kaiser Permanente Los Angeles Medical Center
University Of Colorado Denver And Hospital
North Shore Long Island Jewish Health System

participant_flow.recruitment_details: The study was conducted at 92 centers in 20 countries.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: A total of 276 participants were enrolled, 228 were randomized and 227 received treatment. Participants were not treated because they no longer met study criteria (n=41), withdrew their consent (n=4), showed poor/non-compliance (n=1) or were lost to follow-up (n=2). One participant was randomized by mistake but received no treatment.

group.title: Daclatasvir + Asunaprevir
group.description: Participants received daclatasvir, 60-mg tablet, by mouth once daily + asunaprevir, 100-mg capsule, by mouth twice daily for 24 weeks

group.title: Daclatasvir + Asunaprevir + pegIFN-2a+ Ribavirin
group.description: Participants received daclatasvir, 60-mg tablet, by mouth once daily + asunaprevir, 100-mg capsule or 200-mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα-2a, 180-μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + ribavirin, weight-based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response at Week 12 (SVR12) for All Nonresponders With Genotype 1 Hepatitis C Virus (HCV)
outcome.description: SVR12 defined as HCV RNA<limit of quantitation at follow-up Week 12. Nonresponder (NR)=prior NR to pegIFN-2a or ribavirin.
outcome.population: Participants with genotype 1 HCV who received at least 1 dose of study drug

group.title: Daclatasvir + Asunaprevir + PegIFNα-2a + Ribavirin (NR)
group.description: Participants received daclatasvir, 60-mg tablet by mouth once daily + pegIFNα-2a, 180-μg solution, subcutaneously weekly for 24 weeks + ribavirin, weight-based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks

measure.title: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response at Week 12 (SVR12) for All Nonresponders With Genotype 1 Hepatitis C Virus (HCV)
measure.description: SVR12 defined as HCV RNA<limit of quantitation at follow-up Week 12. Nonresponder (NR)=prior NR to pegIFN-2a or ribavirin.
measure.population: Participants with genotype 1 HCV who received at least 1 dose of study drug

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants Other Than Genotype 1 With Sustained Virologic Response at Post Treatment Week 12 (SVR12)
outcome.description: SVR12 was defined as hepatitis C virus (HCV) RNA less than the lower limit of quantitation, target detected or target not detected at follow-up Week 12.
outcome.population: The analysis was performed in all treated participants who did not exhibit Genotype 1. One subject with indeterminate genotype in the Daclatasvir + Asunaprevir + pegIFN-2a+ Ribavirin Arm/Group was excluded from the analysis

group.title: Daclatasvir + Asunaprevir
group.description: Participants received daclatasvir (DCV), 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + asunaprevir (ASV), 100 mg capsule, by mouth twice daily for 24 weeks.

group.title: DCV + ASV + pegIFN-2a+ Ribavirin (Genotype 4)
group.description: Genotype 4 participants received DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegylated interferon alfa-2a(pegIFNα2a), 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + ribavirin (RBV), weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks.

group.title: DCV + ASV + pegIFN-2a+ RBV (Prior DCV Failures)
group.description: Participants who were nor responders to earlier DCV/pegIFN/RBV therapy were administered with DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks.

group.title: DCV + ASV + pegIFN-2a+ RBV (Prior ASV Failures)
group.description: Participants who were nor responders to earlier ASV/pegIFN/RBV therapy were administered with DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks.

group.title: DCV + ASV + pegIFN-2a+ RBV (Prior BOC Failures)
group.description: Participants who were nor responders to earlier boceprevir(BOC) /pegIFN/RBV therapy were administered with DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks.

group.title: DCV + ASV + pegIFN-2a+ RBV (Prior TVR Failures)
group.description: Participants who were nor responders to earlier telaprevir (TVR) /pegIFN/RBV therapy were administered with DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks.

group.title: DCV + ASV + pegIFN-2a+ RBV (Treatment Naive)
group.description: HCV GT-1a infection treatment-naive participants were administered with DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 12 weeks.

group.title: DCV + ASV + pegIFN-2a+ RBV (pegIFNα /RBV Relapsers)
group.description: pegIFNα /RBV relapsers were administered with DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 12 week.

group.description: Participants who were nor responders to earlier telaprevir (TVR)/pegIFN/RBV therapy were administered with DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks.

group.title: DCV + ASV + pegIFN-2a+ RBV (Treatment Naive)
group.description: HCV GT-1a infection treatment-naive participants were administered with DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 12 weeks.

group.title: DCV + ASV + pegIFN-2a+ RBV (pegIFNα /RBV Relapsers)
group.description: pegIFNα /RBV relapsers were administered with DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 12 week.

group.title: DCV + pegIFN-2a+ RBV
group.description: Participants received DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks.

measure.title: Percentage of Participants With End of the Treatment Response (EOTR)
measure.description: EOTR was defined as the percentage of participants with hepatitis C virus (HCV) RNA less than the lower limit of quantitation, target not detected at end of treatment.
measure.population: The analysis was performed in all treated participants defined as participants who received at least 1 dose of study therapy.

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response at Post Treatment Week 24 (SVR24)
outcome.description: SVR24 was defined as the percentage of participants with hepatitis C virus (HCV) RNA less than the lower limit of quantitation, target detected or target not detected at follow-up week 24.
outcome.population: The analysis was performed in all treated participants defined as participants who received at least 1 dose of study therapy.

group.title: Daclatasvir + Asunaprevir
group.description: Participants received daclatasvir (DCV), 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + asunaprevir (ASV), 100 mg capsule, by mouth twice daily for 24 weeks.

group.description: Participants who were nor responders to earlier telaprevir (TVR)/pegIFN/RBV therapy were administered with DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks.

group.title: DCV + ASV + pegIFN-2a+ RBV (Treatment Naive)
group.description: HCV GT-1a infection treatment-naive participants were administered with DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 12 weeks.

group.title: DCV + ASV + pegIFN-2a+ RBV (pegIFNα /RBV Relapsers)
group.description: pegIFNα /RBV relapsers were administered with DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + ASV,100 mg capsule or 200 mg tablet, by mouth twice daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 12 week.

group.title: DCV + pegIFN-2a+ RBV
group.description: Participants received DCV, 60 mg tablet, by mouth once daily + pegIFNα2a, 80 μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + RBV, weight based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks.

measure.title: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response at Post Treatment Week 24 (SVR24)
measure.description: SVR24 was defined as the percentage of participants with hepatitis C virus (HCV) RNA less than the lower limit of quantitation, target detected or target not detected at follow-up week 24.
measure.population: The analysis was performed in all treated participants defined as participants who received at least 1 dose of study therapy.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Serious Adverse Events (SAEs), Discontinuations Due to AEs, and Who Died During the Study
outcome.description: AE was defined as any new unfavorable symptom, sign, or disease or worsening of a preexisting condition that does not necessarily have a causal relationship with treatment. SAE was defined as a medical event that at any dose resulted in death, persistent or significant disability/incapacity, or drug dependency/abuse; was life-threatening, an important medical event, or a congenital anomaly/birth defect; or required or prolonged hospitalization.
outcome.time_frame: For AEs: Day 1 until last visit. For SAEs: Day 1 until 30 days post discontinuation of dosing or participation
outcome.population: The analysis was performed in all treated participants defined as participants who received at least 1 dose of study therapy.

measure.title: Number of Participants With Serious Adverse Events (SAEs), Discontinuations Due to AEs, and Who Died During the Study
measure.description: AE was defined as any new unfavorable symptom, sign, or disease or worsening of a preexisting condition that does not necessarily have a causal relationship with treatment. SAE was defined as a medical event that at any dose resulted in death, persistent or significant disability/incapacity, or drug dependency/abuse; was life-threatening, an important medical event, or a congenital anomaly/birth defect; or required or prolonged hospitalization.
measure.population: The analysis was performed in all treated participants defined as participants who received at least 1 dose of study therapy.

class.title: AEs leading to discontinuation of therapy

reported_events.time_frame: For AEs: From Day 1, first dose until participant’s last scheduled visit. For SAEs: Date of participant’s written consent until 30 days post discontinuation of dosing or participation in the study if the last scheduled visit occurred later (72 weeks).

group.title: Daclatasvir + Asunaprevir
group.description: Participants received daclatasvir, 60-mg tablet, by mouth once daily + asunaprevir, 100-mg capsule, by mouth twice daily for 24 weeks.

group.title: Daclatasvir + Asunaprevir + pegIFN-2a+ Ribavirin
group.description: Participants received daclatasvir, 60-mg tablet by mouth once daily + pegIFNα-2a, 180-μg solution, subcutaneously weekly for 24 weeks + ribavirin, weight-based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks.

group.title: Daclatasvir + pegIFN-2a+ Ribavirin
group.description: Participants received daclatasvir, 60-mg tablet, by mouth once daily + pegIFNα-2a, 180-μg solution, subcutaneously weekly + ribavirin, weight-based dosing (<75 kg=1000 mg once daily; >=75 kg=1200 mg once daily) for 24 weeks

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Bristol-Myers Squibb Co. agreements with investigators vary; constant is our right to embargo communications regarding trial results prior to public release for a period ≤60 days from submittal for review. We will not prohibit investigators from publishing, but will prohibit the disclosure of previously undisclosed confidential information other than study results, and request postponement of single-center publications until after disclosure of the clinical trial's primary publication.
